overview: The purpose of this measure is to satisfy several claims against the State, its officers, or its employees. [7] Since the bill was last amended, four new claims were resolved that total $587,632.85 (HB990_HD1_TESTIMONY_FIN_02-25-25_.PDF.txt). [5] Including the new claims, the appropriation request totals $6,498,867.07 (HB990_HD1_TESTIMONY_FIN_02-25-25_.PDF.txt) allocated among twenty-one claims. [5]
appropriations: The Department of the Attorney General requests that the bill be amended to increase the requested appropriation by the amount of $587,632.85 (HB990_HD1_TESTIMONY_FIN_02-25-25_.PDF.txt). [5] The updated appropriation request includes an appropriation in the amount of $5,158,867.07 (HB990_HD1_TESTIMONY_FIN_02-25-25_.PDF.txt) to be paid from the general fund and $1,340,000.00 (HB990_HD1_TESTIMONY_FIN_02-25-25_.PDF.txt) to be paid from departmental funds. [5] The legislative document specifies the total general fund appropriation is $5,158,867.07 (HB990_HD2_.HTM.txt) for fiscal year 2024-2025. [6]

six_year_fiscal_implications: Four additional one-time claims for fiscal year 2024-2025 have been added to the bill. [7] A new claim against the Department of Defense for the settlement of Paul Aker v. Hawaii Emergency Management Agency totals $5,000.00 (HB990_HD2_.HTM.txt). [6] A new claim against the Department of Education for the settlement of Katherine Balatico v. State of Hawaii totals $150,000.00 (HB990_HD2_.HTM.txt). [6] The Department of Hawaiian Home Lands has a new claim for the settlement of Royal Contracting Company, Ltd. v. Department of Hawaiian Home Lands for $400,000.00 (HB990_HD2_.HTM.txt). [6] The Department of Taxation has a new claim for the settlement of Deborah Kwan v. State of Hawaii for $32,632.85 (HB990_HD2_.HTM.txt). [6] The total appropriation for claims against the Department of Defense is now $280,000.00 (HB990_HD2_.HTM.txt). [6] The total appropriation for claims against the Department of Education is now $2,405,000.00 (HB990_HD2_.HTM.txt). [6] The total appropriation for claims against the Department of Hawaiian Home Lands is $400,000.00 (HB990_HD2_.HTM.txt). [6] The total appropriation for claims against the Department of Taxation is $32,632.85 (HB990_HD2_.HTM.txt). [6] All unexpended and unencumbered balances of the appropriations made in this Act as of the close of business on June 30, 2026, shall lapse. [6]
